title: What are the best Medium.com publications to write for? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi Rudy, It depends upon your goals. Do you want money, followers, readers, or to simply express yourself? I write for one large publication and a few smaller ones. The larger ones have a wider audience, but the smaller ones have loyal supporters and more of a community. Also, not all publications will suit your writing interests. That said, here is a list of top 100 publications. Smedian

It all depends on what you are writing and who you want to have read your work. The website Smedian | 823 Publications helps acquaint you with the options. You can Google “Top Ten Medium Publications” also but there are pros and cons to aiming at the top…. It’s more rewarding if you get published (more readers) but also greater odds of not being published. I only submit a portion of my work to publications. If you write excellent work, Medium Curators will distribute it to a wider readership. Get familiar with what is happening there and improve your writing as well as the look of your work.

As per my own opinion, you can write on the below topics. as Medium is all about Storytelling content-based platform. Below topics are the most trending in Medium Business.Economy.TechnologyDon’t forget when you are writing on Medium, try to cover all the aspects of the topic you are writing, If it will benefit people reading Medium Stories you will be in a benefit as well. Regards, Emily.
